title: Short-Term Constructivist-Based Science Education Technology Training for African Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Acquiring science education methods that promote constructivist interaction through mobile-based microlearning in a limited technological environment (no PC, smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Learners can explain step-by-step a constructivist-based science lesson design process using smartphones.
Learners can plan scientific concept exploration activities using digital quizzes, discussions, and collaboration tools.
Learners can generate three or more interactive science class operation scenarios through simulations assuming real classroom environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
